PERSONA:
maria is a 55-year-old puerto rican woman living in a metropolitan area in the pacific region of the united states. she was born and raised in the us, and her family has been in the country for generations. maria completed some college but did not obtain a degree. 

despite her hispanic heritage, maria identifies as white and is a citizen of the united states. she is married and comes from an upper-income family, earning over $100,000 annually. 

religiously, maria is a protestant and considers herself a born-again or evangelical christian, although she seldom attends religious services. politically, she leans towards the republican party but is relatively moderate in her ideology, identifying as a moderate or liberal republican.

maria is an avid internet user, spending most of her time online. she is also an active volunteer in her community. while registered to vote, she prefers not to disclose her party affiliation.

overall, maria is a well-established member of her metropolitan community, balancing her cultural heritage with her american identity and maintaining a moderate stance on political and social issues.
